## IConductor interface

Base interface of a Tryorama conductor. Both [Conductor](./tryorama.conductor.md) and [TryCpConductor](./tryorama.trycpconductor.md) implement this interface.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IConductor 
```
